body: It's been quite awhile since I've been on Avicus and there are quite a lot of new faces, so why not an AMA to reintroduce myself!
body_tagged: It's been quite awhile since I've been on Avicus and there are quite a lot of new faces, so why not an AMA to reintroduce myself!
title: Spart's AMA

replies.body: I've been on Avicus for about three years, but I was out for a few months. Before that, I was a moderator for quite a long time
replies.body_tagged: I've been on Avicus for about three years, but I was out for a few months. Before that, I was a moderator for quite a long time

replies.body: My original is Spartemex, but I changed it to JustALittleMagic for a little bit at one point
replies.body_tagged: My original is Spartemex, but I changed it to JustALittleMagic for a little bit at one point

replies.body:
Do you remember me? (I don't remember you xd)
Anyways, I've talked a bit to you on slack, so opinions?
replies.body_tagged:
Do you remember me? (I don't remember you xd)
Anyways, I've talked a bit to you on slack, so opinions?

replies.body:
Spart!! :D

Will you return to the staff team?
What made you want to come back/check-up on us?
Favorite cake flavor?
replies.body_tagged:
Spart!! :D

Will you return to the staff team?
What made you want to come back/check-up on us?
Favorite cake flavor?

replies.body: LOL when I saw your name on "Latest Post", I knew what you wrote
replies.body_tagged: LOL when I saw your name on "Latest Post", I knew what you wrote

replies.body:
I'm trying to come back, I've been talking with people. I came back when I found out plugdj was back, and that made me feel like checking up on what led me to it! I'm not a huge fan of cake, but carrot cake is pretty good :P

@Clock: KFC all the way

@Lasuz: You seem like a pretty cool dude, and fit in will with the Avicus community

replies.body: hey dud, how's that life been? tdm or dtm? ctf or ctw? avi or ocn? bl or kohi(rip)? do u remember mi?
